index.html.title: Raycast Info | JMR Samples
index.html.keywords: Raycast Info Get Information about the raycast Scripts HitInfoManager.cs Shows examples of accessing raycast hit related info. Getting JMRPointerObject cs Transform cursorTransform = JMRPointerManager.Instance.GetCursorTransform(); Getting currently focused object cs GameObject go = JMRPointerManager.Instance.GetCurrentFocusedObject(); Getting raycast hit object cs Ray ray = JMRPointerManager.Instance.GetCurrentRay(); if (Physics.Raycast(ray, out RaycastHit hit)) { } How to use? Download and unzip this project. Open the project using Unity Hub. Download and import the latest version of JMRSDK package. Open and play the HitInfo scene from Assets/Scenes folder.
